players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Diana's gone on the very first night. We need to work together to figure out who did this."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems odd for night 1."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why reveal your investigation result immediately? That seems like a mafia tactic to mislead us."

Charlie: "Bob, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you really are the detective, you've just painted a target on your back. Alice makes good points - why investigate me instead of Diana, and why reveal immediately?"
Bob: "I investigated Charlie because I suspected him, and I was right. Revealing immediately prevents mafia from manipulating us. Trust me, I'm the detective."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
